es.ull.iis.util
Class Output

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.util.Output

public class Output
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the debug messages of the simulator. There are two types of messages: DEBUG and ERROR. ERROR messages are always shown, but DEBUG messages are showed only if the debugOn parameter is true.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

          Creates a default output which doesn't print messages.
